WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please, for this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
WorkItem.Description:
Hello All,
I have created the package and it got installed on the clients. But its still pop-ups saying new updates are available. Is there any way to resolve this.
While creating the package i just selected the msi package options->next->next and publish.
I didnt make any changes in the rules, do i need to select any option to ride this issue.. Please help me.. Thanks in advance
WorkItem.Summary: Package still listing even after installation

Comments.Message:
How the package is repoted after installation (installed, not installed, not applicable) ?
Can you revise the package and look what do you have as "IsInstallable" rule ?

Hi DCourtel,
I have used MSI product installed rule and i dont see "IsInstallable" rule.
And coming to package status, as its creating problem from me i have moved the machines to different WSUS group.. I will test on new client and let you the status.
I am using WPP release 1.3.1407.29
Hi.. current package(Symantec endpoint protection client) status listing as failed even after installation.
